name: A Night Underground
description:
Made for metroidvania month 6

Its a metroidvania, side scrolling action game about fighting creatures from below the earth crust.  They're kept suppressed  but occasionally find a way to attack the surface.  To keep humans dominate on the surface the ancient order of 'The Clan' was formed, each of the members undergo training throughout their entire youth and can only joint society once completed.

notes:

there might be some minor bugs,  and the 'view map' button may only work with shift some of the time but its completely playable and works well
